title: Please help me to identify this font
author: joenunes

comments.content:
Looks edited. Note two forms of \_R\_.  
Might be worth going through the "show more similar fonts" links on the Identifont Trajan page [http://www.identifont.com/find?font=Trajan&q=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415190533/http:/www.identifont.com/find?font=Trajan&q=Go "http://www.identifont.com/find?font=Trajan&q=Go")  
Don

Thank you, donshottype! I think you're right.

Regards,  
Joe Nunes
